channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Correct. (/curses) Beggar's Haunt, far eastern end of Duskwood, on the way to Karazhan for those who have to run ahead and do the summons for the rest of their raid groups.
item.content:encoded: Correct. (/curses) Beggar’s Haunt, far eastern end of Duskwood, on the way to Karazhan for those who have to run ahead and do the summons for the rest of their raid groups.

item.title: By: Brent Michael Krupp
item.dc:creator: Brent Michael Krupp
item.description: Yeah, that's gotta be the least performed Horde quest that there is. Kill a bunch of stuff in Swamp of Sorrows then traipse all the way to Desolace and then come back. For not incredibly exciting rewards. LOL.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, that’s gotta be the least performed Horde quest that there is. Kill a bunch of stuff in Swamp of Sorrows then traipse all the way to Desolace and then come back. For not incredibly exciting rewards. LOL.

item.title: By: Byron Ellacott
item.dc:creator: Byron Ellacott
item.description:
There's a Horde quest chain there. One of the quests involved going all the way over to Desolace and killing the elite Giants there for a very rare drop. Patch notes way back increased the drop rate on them.
http://www.worldofwarcraft.com/patchnotes/patch-05-06-07.html
Deepstrider Tumors. :)
(Curse that quest.)
item.content:encoded:
There’s a Horde quest chain there. One of the quests involved going all the way over to Desolace and killing the elite Giants there for a very rare drop. Patch notes way back increased the drop rate on them.

http://www.worldofwarcraft.com/patchnotes/patch-05-06-07.html

Deepstrider Tumors. ðŸ™‚

(Curse that quest.)

item.title: By: Eradon
item.dc:creator: Eradon
item.description: Yah, been there forever.. just a darn dull place
item.content:encoded: Yah, been there forever.. just a darn dull place

item.title: By: YANE
item.dc:creator: YANE
item.description: It wasn't until recently - having to travel to Karazhan from Darkshire that I even noticed this. And that's after playing on and off for two years now. Has it always been there?
item.content:encoded: It wasn’t until recently – having to travel to Karazhan from Darkshire that I even noticed this. And that’s after playing on and off for two years now. Has it always been there?

item.title: By: Eradon
item.dc:creator: Eradon
item.description: The watchtower in far east duskwood, near the entrance to Deadwind Pass
item.content:encoded: The watchtower in far east duskwood, near the entrance to Deadwind Pass

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description: I would guess one of the abandoned watchtowers in dustwallow marsh, no idea specifically but probably one further away from Theramore if there's no guards?
item.content:encoded: I would guess one of the abandoned watchtowers in dustwallow marsh, no idea specifically but probably one further away from Theramore if there’s no guards?
